mutants.code:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import itertools

def get_similar_rows(df, threshold):
    mask = np.zeros(len(df), dtype=bool)
    for (i, j) in itertools.combinations(range(len(df)), 3):
        similarity = sum(df.iloc[i] == df.iloc[j]) / len(df.columns)
        if similarity >= threshold:
            mask[i] = True
            mask[j] = True
    return mask

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import itertools

def get_similar_rows(df, threshold):
    mask = np.zeros(len(df), dtype=bool)

    return mask

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import itertools

def get_similar_rows(df, threshold):
    mask = np.zeros(len(df), dtype=bool)
    for (i, j) in itertools.combinations(range(len(df)), 2):
        similarity = sum(df.iloc[i] == df.iloc[j]) / len(df.columns)
        if similarity == threshold:
            mask[i] = True
            mask[j] = True
    return mask

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import itertools

def get_similar_rows(df, threshold):
    mask = np.zeros(len(df), dtype=bool)
    for (i, j) in itertools.combinations(range(len(df)), 2):
        similarity = sum(df.iloc[i] == df.iloc[j]) / len(df.columns)
        if similarity >= threshold:
            mask[i] = False
            mask[j] = True
    return mask

    for (i, j) in itertools.combinations(range(len(df)), 2):
        similarity = sum(df.iloc[i] == df.iloc[j]) / len(df.columns)
        if similarity >= threshold:
            mask[i] = True
            mask[j] = False
    return mask

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import itertools

def get_similar_rows(df, threshold):
    mask = np.zeros(len(df), dtype=bool)
    for (i, j) in itertools.combinations(range(len(df)), 2):
        similarity = sum(df.iloc[i] != df.iloc[j]) / len(df.columns)
        if similarity >= threshold:
            mask[i] = True
            mask[j] = True
    return mask
